body:
The GEOS library is having problems finding my Spack-built Python3, it seems to be picking up Python 2.7 from the system.  My command is:

```
spack install py-basemap ^py-matplotlib+gui+ipython ^py-numpy+blas+lapack ^atlas ^python@3:
```

Build log is attached.  I'll look at this soon, but wondering if anyone else has insight.

[spack-build.txt](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/files/191082/spack-build.txt)
title: [BUG] GEOS doesn't build with non-system Python
